explanation: [0-0] In front of a house by the pier, a woman is sitting on the edge of the pier, wearing a brown top and black pants, with a laptop in front of her. A man is squatting next to her, wearing a black hooded top and gray pants, with the hood on his head and a tablet in his hand. Behind them, a man is walking towards them, wearing sunglasses, a red top, carrying a backpack, and holding a stick in his hand. Behind the man in sunglasses, there is a man wearing a hat and a black top, facing away from him.
